summary: Fixes water in 3D Vision using the Creation Kit by making water opaque and eliminating water transparency.
descriptionHtml:
Rolled this fix into 3D Vision Complete Compatibility Project: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9718

Please use that link for any further updates, thanks!

======================================================================
Fixes water in 3D Vision using the Creation Kit by making the water opaque and eliminating refraction shader transparency.  Also addresses some unresolved issue from previous ENB fix like water in Thieves Guild, Ragged Flagon and Ice lands like Ysgramor\'s Tomb.  

Does not currently work with Realistic Water Textures.  I\'ll see if I can use only the defaultwater.dds without breaking anything.

Changelog:

V1.1 - Adjustments to give water a bit more transparency.  Objects under water are still opaque with silhouette.   Changed color of White Run water.  Fixed water near Whiterun, Icelands.

====================================
Installation:

Easiest way to install is to use Skyrim Mod Manager

Otherwise place ESP file into your install location:

%:\\\\Skyrim\\Data   

Then enable 3DVisionWater.ESP in the Skyrim Launcher.

====================================

You can see some example fixes in the link below: 
http://photos.3dvisionlive.com/chizow/image/4f31ef1b378501e30d000062/

-------------------------------------------------------
Credits:
Bethesda for releasing Creation Kit

Nvidia for releasing and supporting awesome 3D hardware

Anyone who has made mods to help make 3D Vision better.
author: chizow
